statements: DELETE FROM sea_level_data WHERE location = 'Beach' AND erosion_level = 'Moderate';
DELETE FROM sea_level_data WHERE location = 'Beach' AND sea_level_height > 5.0;
DELETE FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND measurement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_area = 'North Beach' AND measurement_date = '2021-12-15';
DELETE FROM CoastalErosionData WHERE Location = 'Miami' AND MeasurementDate = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM Coastal_Erosion_Data WHERE location = 'Beach A';
DELETE FROM Adaptation_Planning WHERE strategy = 'Managed Retreat';
DELETE FROM personnel WHERE name = 'John Doe';
